TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ProjectExtensionsElement extends Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectElement

Docs.summary: Represents the ProjectExtensions Element (MSBuild) in an MSBuild project. Project extensions can contain arbitrary XML content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The ProjectExtensions element is deprecated and provided only for backward compatibility. Use a <xref:Microsoft.Build.Construction.ProjectPropertyElement> instead.

Docs.summary: Gets a nonexistent condition, which is implicitly true.
